token.title: The token of the user
token.description:
The token of the user.

The caller must hold this token securely.
To authenticate the user after the token is acquired, pass the token to the
`Authorization` header with the `Bearer` prefix.

Example:
```
Authorization: Bearer <token>
```

expiresAt.title: The expiry time of the token
expiresAt.description: The expiry time of the token.

status.title: The status of the health check
status.description: The status of the health check.

databaseRoundTripDelay.title: The time it took to execute a raw SQL query on the database
databaseRoundTripDelay.description:
The time it took to execute a raw SQL query on the database.

If the database is not reachable, this value is not included.
